body:
Comment 3 by **bcannon**: 
Just in case anyone else comes across this issue, the docs (at least now; maybe I missed
it initially like I did that Duration was a type) point out that you can cast a Duration
to int64, so you can do all of your math with Durations as conversion constants to work
with the correct units and then cast the final value to int64() when you want to use
your result.
